casebody.data:
Columbus Bar Association v. Bowen.

[Cite as Columbus Bar Assn. v. Bowen (1999), 87 Ohio St.3d 126.]

(No. 99-833 Submitted July 28, 1999 Decided October 13, 1999.) *128Bruce Campbell and Janice M. Bernard, for relator. John W.E. Bowen, pro se. Per Curiam.

We adopt the findings, conclusions, and recommendation of the board. Respondent is hereby suspended from the practice of law' for six months. Costs are taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
